Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Trains bypassing Western (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to police activity.

Shuttle buses will be available between Kedzie-Homan and Illinois Medical District to provide connecting service. 

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: Howard-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Davis. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Davis.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
